game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of the old king
game.description: You are tasked with journeying through the foreboding forest of Elendil to find the lost treasure of the old king.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and ancient royal amulet

task.objective: Find the ancient map in the old library
task.description: The first step is to locate the ancient map hidden in the old library which holds the key to the forest route.
Use the map to navigate through the perilous forest and locate the hidden cave. Beware of the forest creatures!
Find the hidden treasure in the cave and return it to the ancient ghost at the old library.
task.location: Hidden cave in the Forest of Elendil, Ancient Ghost's Location
